cards.name: Akros
cards.text:
Whenever a player attacks, creatures they control get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
Whenever chaos ensues, exile up to two target creatures you control, then return them to the battlefield under their owner's control. They gain haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Beauclaire Manor
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may sacrifice a nonland permanent. If you do, create a 2/2 white, blue and black Noble creature token.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may exchange control of target nonland permanent you control and target nonland permanent you don't control until you planeswalk away from Beauclaire Manor.

cards.name: Before the Chasmal Rift
cards.text:
Whenever you play a card from anywhere other than your hand, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”
Whenever chaos ensues, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens with “Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.” Then colorless creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of times you've rolled the planar die this turn.

cards.name: Boorah Depths
cards.text:
During each player's ending phase, their opponents may cast spells as though they had flash.
Whenever chaos ensues, draw a card, then untap up to three lands.

cards.name: Butani Pass
cards.text:
Whenever a land enters, its controller creates a 2/2 red Yeti creature token.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may have target creature you control deal damage equal to its power to any target. If the creature you control is a Yeti, it deals double that damage instead.

cards.name: Castle Stehlia
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Castle Stehlia and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a Treasure token.
Spells cost {1} more to cast.
Whenever chaos ensues, untap each artifact you control, then you gain 1 life for each artifact you control.

cards.name: Cawyer Station
cards.text:
Whenever a player disturbs the peace, that player may create a 2/2 white Soldier creature token. They may do so only once each turn. (Casting a spell on an opponent's turn and one or more creatures dealing combat damage to an opponent disturb the peace.)
Whenever chaos ensues, detain up to three target nonland permanents you don't control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

cards.name: Corgan-Ozzen Command
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may scry 2.
Whenever chaos ensues, look at the top twelve cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: Data Channels
cards.text:
Data Channels is blue.
When you planeswalk to Data Channels and at the beginning of your upkeep, make a pledge. (Create any blue Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)
Whenever chaos ensues, surveil 1, then return up to one noncreature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Den of the First Dream
cards.text:
During each player's turn, each instant and sorcery card in their graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
Whenever chaos ensues, each player mills ten cards.

cards.name: Eltensia's Toll
cards.text:
Whenever a player draws a card, each of their opponents lose 1 life.
Whenever chaos ensues, draw three cards, then discard two cards.

cards.name: Foundation Headquarters
cards.text:
When you begin on or planeswalk to Foundation Headquarters, each player mills eight cards.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard and cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost. If it had mana value 5 or greater, you may cast two copies of that spell instead.

cards.name: Fourth Street
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, Fourth Street deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of spells you've cast this turn.
Whenever chaos ensues, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then you may roll the planar die.

cards.name: Fragile Haven
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.
Whenever chaos ensues, journey three times, then planeswalk. (Exile the top three cards of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.name: Goldpeak Gateway
cards.text:
Goldpeak Gateway is red.
When you planeswalk to Goldpeak Gateway and at the beginning of your upkeep, make a pledge. (Create any red Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)
Whenever chaos ensues, teach target creature you control menace. (To teach menace, put a menace counter on it. If it already has menace, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

cards.name: Goresand
cards.text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Goresand deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever chaos ensues, create two 2/2 red Hyena creature tokens.

cards.name: Gravelgate Underpass
cards.text:
Gravelgate Underpass is black.
When you planeswalk to Gravelgate Underpass and at the beginning of your upkeep, make a pledge. (Create any black Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)
Whenever chaos ensues, put a decayed counter on target creature an opponent controls. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

cards.name: Greenglade Campsite
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Greenglade Campsite and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Centaur creature token with vigilance.
Whenever chaos ensues, creatures you control gain lifelink and double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Halls of Valor
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control dies while attacking, create a colorless Aura enchantment token with enchant creature you control and “Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.”
Whenever chaos ensues, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

cards.name: Heaven's Impact
cards.text:
Artifact creatures get +1/+1.
Whenever chaos ensues, up to one target creature you control becomes a copy of another target creature, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

cards.name: Holo Arts District
cards.text:
Lands have “{3}: Until end of turn, this land becomes a 3/3 green Elemental creature with vigilance and haste. It's still a land.”
Whenever chaos ensues, return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Jericho's Abandoned Office
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, that player investigates. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
Whenever chaos ensues, each noncreature artifact you control becomes a green Horror creature with base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. (They aren't artifacts for the duration.)

cards.name: Justiciar Test Lab
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Justiciar Test Lab and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose flying, trample, or menace. Create a Gadget of that type. (It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} that grants that ability.)
Whenever chaos ensues, untap each modified creature you control. After this main phase, there's an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

cards.name: Kaina City Market
cards.text:
Whenever a player spends mana, they may amass Toys X, where X is the amount of mana spent. They may do so only once each turn. (To amass Toy X, put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Toy. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Toy Army creature token first.)
Whenever chaos ensues, create a token that's a copy of a token on the battlefield. For each counter on it, put a counter of that kind on the copy.

cards.name: Karsi's Spine
cards.text:
Dragon spells cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever chaos ensues, create two Treasure tokens, then each player creates a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

cards.name: Khembul, the Sacred Valley
cards.text:
When you begin on or planeswalk to Khembul, the Sacred Valley, permanents and players gain protection from everything until the start of your next turn.
Whenever chaos ensues, the next time you cast a spell this turn, you may copy that spell for each card with the same name as that spell in your graveyard. You may choose new targets for the copies.

cards.name: Kochiba Port
cards.text:
Each spell a player casts during another player's turn costs {1} less to cast.
Whenever chaos ensues, target opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent.

cards.name: Kywon's Testing Grounds
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Lower Teqien
cards.text:
Whenever a player draws or discards a card, that player loses 1 life.
Whenever chaos ensues, each player with fewer than seven cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference. Then planeswalk.

cards.name: Minamo City Contest Hall
cards.text:
At the beginning of each combat, each player chooses a creature. Those creatures must attack or block this combat if able.
Whenever chaos ensues, each player puts a stun counter on a creature you don't control of their choice.

cards.name: Mishiro Town
cards.text:
When you begin on or planeswalk to Mishiro Town, each player searches their library for a basic land card, reveals it, puts it into their hand, then shuffles.
Whenever chaos ensues, search your library for a creature card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Mokar Valley
cards.text:
Creature spells cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever chaos ensues, look at the top ten cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.

cards.name: Mysterious Ruins
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, target player of their choice mills X cards, where X is that spell's mana value.
Whenever chaos ensues, exile a card from your graveyard. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

cards.name: New Tellison
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to New Tellison and at the beginning of your upkeep, add the top card of your library to your evil plan. (Look at the top card of your library, then exile it face-down. You may pay {7} once a turn as a sorcery to cast any number of cards in your evil plan without paying their mana costs.)
When chaos ensues, you may pay {0} rather than {7} to cast your evil plan this turn.

cards.name: Prismatic Pool
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell that targets a spell or permanent of an enemy color, they draw a card. (White's enemies are black and red, blue's are red and green, black's are white and green, red's are white and blue, and green's are blue and black.)
Whenever chaos ensues, choose a color among permanents you control. Then for each of that color's enemies, you may destroy up to one target permanent of that enemy color.

cards.name: Professor Maple's Lab
cards.text:
Whenever you planeswalk to Professor Maple's Lab and at the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with power 3 or less.
Whenever chaos ensues, create a 2/1 red Weasel with first strike, a 1/3 blue Crocodile with vigilance, or a 3/2 green Plant creature token.

cards.name: Queen Solena's Private Collection
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, they create a tapped Treasure token.
Whenever chaos ensues, create a colorless artifact token named Gilded Lotus with “{T}: Add three mana of any one color.”

cards.name: Remains of Morrig Moor
cards.text:
When you begin on or planeswalk to Remains of Morrig Moor and whenever you draw a card, create a Glyph token. (It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this: Scry 1.”)
Whenever chaos ensues, abilities of artifacts you activate this turn cost {1} less to activate.

cards.name: Remembrance Tower
cards.text:
Whenever you begin on or planeswalk to Remembrance Tower or a creature dies, each player mills two cards.
Whenever chaos ensues, return a creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Rio Mancuna
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a permanent spell that shares no card types with a permanent they control, that player draws a card.
Whenever chaos ensues, create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Ruins of Missing Notes
cards.text:
If a card would leave the battlefield, instead exile it and put an unknown counter on it.
If you would planeswalk away from Ruins of Missing Notes, you may have chaos ensue instead.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may remove an unknown counter from an exiled card. If you do, you may play that card as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana of any type to cast it.

cards.name: Ruins of Olantin
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of a nonland permanent you control with mana value X or less.
Whenever chaos ensues, choose a color. Create an X/X colorless enchantment artifact creature token named Follower, where X is your devotion to the chosen color.

cards.name: Ruins of Paro Katsang
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Ruins of Paro Katsang, each player discards a card, sacrifices a creature, sacrifices a land, and loses 3 life. (This doesn't trigger if you begin the game on Ruins of Paro Katsang.)
Whenever chaos ensues, choose target card in a graveyard. You may play that card this turn. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost.

cards.name: San Jera Raceway
cards.text:
The second spell each player casts each turn costs {2} less to cast.
Whenever chaos ensues, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

cards.name: Seat of the Rose Court
cards.text:
Whenever a player loses 2 or more life, each of that player's opponents create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)
Whenever chaos ensues, when you next cast a spell this turn, you may sacrifice two permanents. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.name: Setessa
cards.text:
At the beginning of your second main phase, add {C}{C}.
Whenever chaos ensues, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Skycrest Estates
cards.text:
Skycrest Estates is white.
When you planeswalk to Skycrest Estates and at the beginning of your upkeep, make a pledge. (Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)
Whenever chaos ensues, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

cards.name: Starfoul Glade
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
Whenever chaos ensues, exile any number of nonland permanents you control, then return them to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Tambara Totem-Forest
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Tambara Totem-Forest, each player may create a colorless Aura enchantment token attached to a permanent they control. The token has enchant permanent and umbra armor. (If enchanted permanent would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy the Aura.)
Whenever chaos ensues, enchanted creatures you control gain double strike and lifelink until end of turn.

cards.name: Test Site: Syzygy
cards.text:
Test Site: Syzygy is green.
When you planeswalk to Test Site: Syzygy and at the beginning of your upkeep, make a pledge. (Create any green Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)
Whenever chaos ensues, choose a color, then you add four mana of that color.

cards.name: The Ashen Forges
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, create a Weapon token. The next time you activate an equip ability this turn, it costs {2} less to activate. (A Weapon token is an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)
Whenever chaos ensues, sacrifice up to three artifacts and/or creatures. Draw that many cards and add twice that much {C}.

cards.name: The Bastion d'Orlet
cards.text:
Whenever you attack, The Bastion d'Orlet deals 1 damage to defending player for each creature attacking that player.
Whenever chaos ensues, create a 3/2 artifact Construct creature token with trample named Battering Ram.

cards.name: The Broken Fields
cards.text:
Each creature that has attacked this turn has persist. (When that creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
Whenever chaos ensues, choose any number of permanents. You may remove a counter from each of those permanents.

cards.name: The Crossroads
cards.text:
Whenever you attack, up to one target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature types among attacking non-Coward creatures you control.
Whenever chaos ensues, choose a creature type. Create a 1/1 red creature token with haste of the chosen type.

cards.name: The Five-Thorn Maw
cards.text:
Whenever you tap a creature you control, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. 
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
Whenever chaos ensues, untap any number of tapped creatures and/or lands you control. Put a stun counter on each of them.

cards.name: The Golden Palace
cards.text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life and/or drew two or more cards this turn, you may tap target nonland permanent and put a stun counter on it.
Whenever chaos ensues, you draw a card and gain 3 life.

cards.name: The Ozanwood
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to The Ozanwood and at the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library.
Spells cast from anywhere other than a player's hand cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may play cards exiled with The Ozanwood until end of turn.

cards.name: The Silenced Court
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to The Silenced Court, exile all creatures. When you are no longer on this plane, return each creature exiled this way to the battlefield under their owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may put a creature card exiled with this plane onto the battlefield tapped under your control.

cards.name: The Source Chamber
cards.text:
You may play cards you own from outside the game.
Whenever chaos ensues, until end of turn, permanents you control gain “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”

cards.name: The Tugae
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to The Tugae and at the beginning of your upkeep, untap up to one target land you control. It becomes a 4/4 green Elemental creature with haste and vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land.
Whenever chaos ensues, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: The Underworld
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, that player mills four cards.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a white Aura enchantment token attached to target creature you control with enchant creature and “Enchanted creature gains all activated and triggered abilities of the exiled card and gets +X/+Y, where X is equal to the exiled card's power and Y is equal to its toughness.”

cards.name: The Veilgate
cards.text:
Whenever a permanent enters, its controller may surveil 1.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw five cards.

cards.name: Thorne Chapel
cards.text:
Creatures can't attack unless they're reverent. (Angels, Clerics, and Demons are reverent.)
Whenever chaos ensues, flips a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 3 life and create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying. If you lose the flip, you lose 3 life and create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

cards.name: Towashi
cards.text:
Modified creatures you control have trample and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.” (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
Whenever chaos ensues, distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.

cards.name: Tower of the Techmagi
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap a permanent you control. It gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever chaos ensues, gain control of target permanent until end of turn.

cards.name: Ukshu Wilds
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Ukshu Wilds and at the beginning of your upkeep, crystallize. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Treasure.)
Whenever chaos ensues, each player chooses the creature they control with the highest power or tied for the highest power among creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.

cards.name: Vaudlin's Laboratory
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Vaudlin's Laboratory, each player may return up to two creature cards in their graveyard to their hand.
Whenever chaos ensues, you may put a deathtouch counter on target creature you control.

cards.name: Veda's Club
cards.text:
During each player's turn, nonland cards in their hand have spectacle. The spectacle cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by up to {2}. (You may cast a card for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Whenever chaos ensues, target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn it and can't block or be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Whitecliff
cards.text:
When you begin on or planeswalk to Whitecliff, put a bait counter on it.
When you planeswalk away from Whitecliff, for each bait counter on it, create a 3/3 green Yeti creature token with trample.
Whenever chaos ensues, put two bait counters on Whitecliff.

cards.name: Zolo's Ring
cards.text:
When you planeswalk to Zolo's Ring and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 3/3 red and green Ox creature token with haste. It attacks this combat if able.
Whenever chaos ensues, any number of target creatures you control each dare 5 until end of turn. (It becomes a legendary Rebel with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types until end of turn.)
